statements: DELETE FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE system_id = 5 AND confidence_level > 0.75;
DELETE FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE event_id = 1 AND system_id = 100;
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE audit_id = 100 AND decision = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM trading_systems WHERE system_name = 'AlphaTrading' OR system_id = 50;
DELETE FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 100 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM trade_records WHERE trade_type = 'SELL' AND quantity <= 100;
DELETE FROM model_performance WHERE model_id = 201 AND metric = 'accuracy';
DELETE FROM decision_history WHERE model_id = 5 AND result = 'success';
